page.title: 12LEISURE IN RAMSGATE
page.content: During the day people can swim in the sea or indoor pool,play in the park or on the amusements.At night there are pubs,social and night clubs and restaurants.During the summer, trains and coaches bring holiday makers from places like London for the sun and sea.The 4 main parks in Ramsgate have swings and climbing frames and most are ideal for walking about to enjoy the fresh air.Some offer tennis and bowls for a small fee.The coast by the marina is popular with walkers and fishermen.The marina swimming pool was closed down as it was too expensive to keep in good repair and has been filled in scarring the landscape! Pubs like Kent's in King street have been "jazzed up" to look modern and play loud music whilst others attract people wanting a quiet drink and chat. The cinema runs 2 screens at a time.
